About Blink

Blink

Version 0.1.0

Instant video calls with a single hotkey press.

üöÄ Quick Start Guide:

  1. Add a Target: Click "Add Target" in the Targets tab
  2. Share Your Code: Copy the generated code and send it to your partner
  3. Get Their Code: Click "Import" and paste their code
  4. Set Hotkeys: Configure your shortcuts in the Hotkeys tab
  5. Start Calling: Press your hotkey to instantly connect!

üí° Tips & Tricks:

  • Access Settings: Right-click the tray icon (system tray)
  • Primary Target: The "Primary" target is used for your main hotkey
  • Multiple Targets: You can have different codes for different people
  • Privacy: Calls are private - only people with your code can join
  • No Accounts: No sign-ups needed - just share codes and call!

üîß Troubleshooting:

  • Hotkeys not working? Check the Hotkeys tab and try different combinations
  • Can't find the app? Look for the Blink icon in your system tray
  • Call not connecting? Make sure you and your partner have the same code
